pages.text: The $(thing)Distiller$() allows metal solutions created in the Vat to be turned into solid metal crystals that can then be smelted. To build a Distiller, the bottom layer must be radiator blocks into which steam is piped, the layer above has to be hotplate blocks to distribute the heat, and then a tank needs to be built on top (using Distiller Tank blocks) with inputs and outputs placed into the tank.
